title: Is iTunes Even Relevant Anymore?
content: With streaming services like Apple Music and Spotify, we question if iTunes is still used by enough people.

title: Want to be challenged?
content: Check out this new tech quiz that just landed. It will challenge you in JavaScript, Node.js, SQL, and more!

title: Will AI take your job?
content: With the growing interest in ChatGPT and other AI programs, we wonder if AI will threaten to decrease the job market.
